member.name: T:Joonasw.AadTestingDemo.API.Authorization.Actions
member.summary: Actions that can be done on the API

member.name: F:UPrinceV4.Web.Authorization.AuthorizedPermissions.DelegatedPermissionsForActions
member.summary: Contains the allowed delegated permissions for each action. If the caller has one of the allowed ones, they should be allowed to perform the action.

member.name: F:UPrinceV4.Web.Authorization.AuthorizedPermissions.ApplicationPermissionsForActions
member.summary: Contains the allowed application permissions for each action. If the caller has one of the allowed ones, they should be allowed to perform the action.

member.name: T:UPrinceV4.Web.OpenApi.OAuthSecurityRequirementOperationFilter
member.summary: Adds security requirements to API operations
